Default value: `1*1024*1024*1024`

Default value: `1`

  ]

Default value: `'8.x'`

##### <a name="-profile--nodejs--version"></a>`version`

Data type:

```puppet
Variant[
    Eit_types::Package_Ensure,
    Eit_types::Version
  ]
```



Default value: `'present'`

##### <a name="-profile--nodejs--__package_allow_virtual"></a>`__package_allow_virtual`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `true`

### <a name="profile--php"></a>`profile::php`

generic php setup
webserver part (in mod_php case) is done by profile::web::apache (only one with mod_php support)
profiles MUST be feature based. ie. $opcodecache option (apc,xcache,none)
- and NOT just a list of config settings, such as $modules..
we then use $opcodecache setting to conclude WHAT modules should be loaded.

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `profile::php` class:

* [`ensure`](#-profile--php--ensure)
* [`date_timezone`](#-profile--php--date_timezone)
* [`ssl`](#-profile--php--ssl)
* [`mysql`](#-profile--php--mysql)
* [`phpfpm`](#-profile--php--phpfpm)
* [`mod_php`](#-profile--php--mod_php)
* [`composer`](#-profile--php--composer)
* [`dev`](#-profile--php--dev)
* [`display_errors`](#-profile--php--display_errors)
* [`expose_php`](#-profile--php--expose_php)
* [`imagehandling`](#-profile--php--imagehandling)
* [`mssql`](#-profile--php--mssql)
* [`error_log`](#-profile--php--error_log)
* [`opcodecache`](#-profile--php--opcodecache)
* [`version`](#-profile--php--version)
* [`config_root`](#-profile--php--config_root)
* [`memory_limit`](#-profile--php--memory_limit)
* [`apc_shm_size`](#-profile--php--apc_shm_size)
* [`post_max_size`](#-profile--php--post_max_size)
* [`upload_max_filesize`](#-profile--php--upload_max_filesize)
* [`modules`](#-profile--php--modules)
* [`phpfpm_settings`](#-profile--php--phpfpm_settings)
* [`phpfpm_pool`](#-profile--php--phpfpm_pool)

##### <a name="-profile--php--ensure"></a>`ensure`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-profile--php--date_timezone"></a>`date_timezone`

Data type: `Eit_types::Timezone`



Default value: `$::common::system::time::timezone`

##### <a name="-profile--php--ssl"></a>`ssl`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `false`

##### <a name="-profile--php--mysql"></a>`mysql`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `false`

##### <a name="-profile--php--phpfpm"></a>`phpfpm`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `false`

##### <a name="-profile--php--mod_php"></a>`mod_php`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `false`

##### <a name="-profile--php--composer"></a>`composer`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `false`

##### <a name="-profile--php--dev"></a>`dev`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `false`

##### <a name="-profile--php--display_errors"></a>`display_errors`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `false`

##### <a name="-profile--php--expose_php"></a>`expose_php`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `false`

##### <a name="-profile--php--imagehandling"></a>`imagehandling`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-profile--php--mssql"></a>`mssql`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `false`

##### <a name="-profile--php--error_log"></a>`error_log`

Data type: `Enum['syslog']`



Default value: `'syslog'`

##### <a name="-profile--php--opcodecache"></a>`opcodecache`

Data type: `Enum[ 'opcache', 'xcache', 'apc' ]`



Default value: `'apc'`

##### <a name="-profile--php--version"></a>`version`

Data type: `Optional[Eit_types::Version]`



Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-profile--php--config_root"></a>`config_root`

Data type: `Optional[Stdlib::Absolutepath]`



Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-profile--php--memory_limit"></a>`memory_limit`

Data type: `Optional[Eit_types::Capacity]`



Default value: `'192M'`

##### <a name="-profile--php--apc_shm_size"></a>`apc_shm_size`

Data type: `Optional[Eit_types::Capacity]`



Default value: `'192M'`

##### <a name="-profile--php--post_max_size"></a>`post_max_size`

Data type: `Optional[Eit_types::Capacity]`



Default value: `'100M'`

##### <a name="-profile--php--upload_max_filesize"></a>`upload_max_filesize`

Data type: `Optional[Eit_types::Capacity]`



Default value: `'100M'`

##### <a name="-profile--php--modules"></a>`modules`

Data type: `Hash[Eit_types::SimpleString, Hash]`



Default value: `{}`

##### <a name="-profile--php--phpfpm_settings"></a>`phpfpm_settings`

Data type: `Hash`



Default value: `{}`

##### <a name="-profile--php--phpfpm_pool"></a>`phpfpm_pool`

Data type: `Hash[Eit_types::SimpleString, Hash]`



Default value:

```puppet
{
    'www' => $phpfpm_settings,
  }
```

### <a name="profile--puppet"></a>`profile::puppet`

We want to stick to PC1 repo
so we can setup puppet-agent package

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `profile::puppet` class:

* [`noop_value`](#-profile--puppet--noop_value)
* [`server`](#-profile--puppet--server)
* [`server_port`](#-profile--puppet--server_port)
* [`version`](#-profile--puppet--version)
* [`setup_agent`](#-profile--puppet--setup_agent)
* [`configure_agent`](#-profile--puppet--configure_agent)
* [`config_file`](#-profile--puppet--config_file)
* [`run_agent_as_noop`](#-profile--puppet--run_agent_as_noop)
* [`extra_main_settings`](#-profile--puppet--extra_main_settings)
* [`package_version_suffix`](#-profile--puppet--package_version_suffix)
* [`aio_package_name`](#-profile--puppet--aio_package_name)
* [`environment`](#-profile--puppet--environment)

##### <a name="-profile--puppet--noop_value"></a>`noop_value`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `false`

##### <a name="-profile--puppet--server"></a>`server`

Data type: `Stdlib::Host`



Default value: `$::common::puppet::server`

##### <a name="-profile--puppet--server_port"></a>`server_port`

Data type: `Stdlib::Port`



Default value: `$::common::puppet::server_port`

##### <a name="-profile--puppet--version"></a>`version`

Data type: `Eit_types::Version`



Default value: `$::common::puppet::version`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `$::common::puppet::setup_agent`

##### <a name="-profile--puppet--configure_agent"></a>`configure_agent`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `$::common::puppet::configure_agent`

##### <a name="-profile--puppet--config_file"></a>`config_file`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`



Default value: `$::common::puppet::config_file`

##### <a name="-profile--puppet--run_agent_as_noop"></a>`run_agent_as_noop`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `$::common::puppet::run_agent_as_noop`

Default value: `$::common::puppet::extra_main_settings`

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-profile--wordpress--install_dir"></a>`install_dir`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`



Default value: `'/var/www/wordpress'`

### <a name="profile--wsgi"></a>`profile::wsgi`

WSGI profile

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `profile::wsgi` class:

* [`domains`](#-profile--wsgi--domains)
* [`ssl`](#-profile--wsgi--ssl)
* [`uwsgi`](#-profile--wsgi--uwsgi)
* [`mod_wsgi`](#-profile--wsgi--mod_wsgi)
* [`http_server`](#-profile--wsgi--http_server)

##### <a name="-profile--wsgi--domains"></a>`domains`

Data type: `Array[Stdlib::Fqdn]`



##### <a name="-profile--wsgi--ssl"></a>`ssl`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `false`

##### <a name="-profile--wsgi--uwsgi"></a>`uwsgi`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `false`

##### <a name="-profile--wsgi--mod_wsgi"></a>`mod_wsgi`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `false`

##### <a name="-profile--wsgi--http_server"></a>`http_server`

Data type: `Enum['nginx', 'apache']`



Default value: `'nginx'`
